article.title: DCS Awarded $191 Million Technical Engineering Services Contract
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: DCS Corporation, Alexandria, Virginia, was awarded a $191 million contract to provide for technical engineering services, including post-production software support, lifecycle software engineering to program managers in the acquisition and development of main weapon systems platforms, and systems engineering on project within Tank-Automotive Research, Development and Engineering Center.Â The U.S. Army Tank-Automotive and Armaments Command, Warren, Michigan, is the contracting activity.
